name: Resonance (Demo)
description:
Stealth horror game that forces the player to escape a freighter ship overtaken by hostile sound-oriented enemies. Developed By Revision Interactive:

Christian Moncada :
Game Designer (Level, Content, Systems)

Aedyn Timm-Bradley : 
Environment Artist And 3D Modeler

Nathan Tyborski :
Gameplay & Engine Programmer

Stephen Chin:
Concept Artist, Character Artist

Shesh Gaur:
Engine & A.I. Programmer, Composer & Sound Designer
